item.title: Mastercard Backtracks After Getting Caught Using Ad Dollars To Censor Conservatives
item.description: The $500 billion corporation that was 'instrumental in the formation' of the GARM censorship machine has apparently reversed course.

item.title: Tariffs Are The Only Way To Restore America’s Long-Term Economic Health
item.description: To make America make things again, tariffs are the only option.

item.title: From MLB To Coca-Cola, Woke Corporations Refuse To Apologize For Smearing Georgia’s Election Integrity Law
item.description: Major League Baseball, Coca-Cola, and Delta Air Lines are refusing to apologize for smearing Georgia's election integrity law.

item.title: The Fight Against The Censorship-Industrial Complex Is Not Over
item.description: Those who would keep the truth from U.S. citizens must be rooted out. We need a full accounting of what happened when transparency failed.
